meanings.definition: A mixture of hydrocarbons obtained from petroleum, used as a solvent.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic used ligroins to clean the engine parts.
meanings.sent2: She poured ligroins into the container to dissolve the stubborn residue.
meanings.sent3: The detective solved the case by using ligroins to reveal hidden fingerprints.
meanings.sent4: The ligroins acted like a superhero, swooping in to save the day by dissolving the mystery substance.
meanings.sent5: The smell of ligroins filled the room, overpowering any other scents.

meanings.definition: To clean or dissolve using ligroins.
meanings.sent1: He ligroinsed the greasy stove to make it shine again.
meanings.sent2: The company regularly ligroinses their equipment to maintain cleanliness.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they watched their toys being ligroinsed in the soapy solution.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to ligroins the tension in the room, making everyone relax.
meanings.sent5: The rain ligroinsed away the dirt from the sidewalks, leaving them sparkling clean.

meanings.definition: The ligroins are stored in a separate container.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to label the container holding the ligroins.
meanings.sent2: The warehouse has a special section dedicated to storing ligroins safely.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the container of ligroins, causing a slippery mess.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the experiment were locked away in the container of ligroins.
meanings.sent5: The workers wore protective gear while handling the container of ligroins.
